Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Game Credits
{? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | Marrach | Castle Marrach Design by Christopher Allen, Michael Blum, Lisa Disterheft, Staci Dumoski, Chaz Engan, Jan Engan, and Karen Meisner
Game Programming by Wes Connell, Eric Olsen, and Par Winzell
ActiveX Client Programming by Albert Degenaar II
Game Artwork by Richard Laiacona and Stephanie Pui mun-law
Additional Help by Chris Andrien, Shannon Appelcline, Dana Lombardy, Renee Middleton, and Heather Stoermer
Special thanks to significant others who were patient while we worked on this project and to our wonderful alpha testers who helped us fix early bugs so you didn't see them today.
| Skotos games and Theatres designed by Skotos Tech Inc.
}
